messages.title: Making Brexit a Success is Central to Our National Interest
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest — and it is central to our own security and prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand to ensure economic security, better paying jobs, affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and strong NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: People are saying Jeremy Corbyn can’t possibly become Prime Minister.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest.
issues.economy: Delivering better paying jobs, more affordable housing.
issues.education: Delivering a good school place for every child.
issues.health: Delivering a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

contactInformation.address: CCHQ, 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ
